name: Enjoyventure Management
overview:
Based in Dusseldorf, Hanover and Gelsenkirchen enjoyventure Management GmbH specializes in the beginning of the decade to the financing of mainly German companies in the seed or start-up phase. The investment focus is on innovative production and IT technologies.

The first, launched in early 2000, investment funds, the Long Venture Capital GmbH, a total of ten young companies, financed in part from the automotive, materials technology and telecommunications. For the holdings were 20 other venture capital firms the same investment of around 90 million EUR in the framework of more than 25 rounds of financing involved will be one with - an important milestone in the history of venture capital company, in turbulent times began. Economically a more to a long Venture Capital …

From 2005/2006 specifically the requirement of additional funds has been developed. This should be continued in the first generation of funds and experience in the new fund concepts successfully implemented. Investments in technology in the early seed stage is always a close coordination between the company and investors is important for the company’s structure. So was also integrated to further develop the technology focus in regional proximity with the fund concepts.

For this reason, the new fund, the ELS funds in the Ruhr area and the hif (hannover innovation fund) and the growth fund HBF (Hannover equity funds) in the Hannover region, aimed at a high regional support. Both regions are characterized by very interesting clusters and as a university and research sites also. More about the Hannover Activities …

As the trusted brand for high-tech venture capital venture is set to enjoy an intensive network of contacts in industry and research as well as good relations with other venture capital firms. The strong focus on early-stage financing and a sound technical know-how is enjoyventure one thing: a competent partner in all business challenges start-ups.
